properties.entry: INSERT INTO BookingType (Id, Name, Remarks, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, UpdatedBy, UpdatedOn) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE BookingType SET Name = ?, Remarks = ?, UpdatedBy = ?, UpdatedOn = ? WHERE Id = ?
SELECT Id, Name, Remarks FROM BookingType WHERE Id = ?
SELECT Id, Name, Remarks FROM BookingType ORDER BY Id DESC
